verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> did <S%H2372>see.<s%>

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> you up a <S%H5251>banner<s%> on the <S%H8192>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H7311>exalt<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> to them, <S%H5130>shake<s%> the <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that they may <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H6607>gates<s%> of the <S%H5081>nobles.<s%>

I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> my <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> ones, I have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> my <S%H1368>mighty<s%> ones for my <S%H639>anger,<s%> even them that <S%H5947>rejoice<s%> in my <S%H1346>highness.<s%>

The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H1823>like<s%> as of a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> a <S%H7588>tumultuous<s%> <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> together: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H6485>musters<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

They <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> from the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> even the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of his <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> to <S%H2254>destroy<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H3213>Howl<s%> you; for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7138>at<s%> <S%H7138>hand;<s%> it shall <S%H935>come<s%> as a <S%H7701>destruction<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H7503>faint,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H582>man's<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H4549>melt:<s%>

And they shall be <S%H926>afraid:<s%> <S%H6735>pangs<s%> and <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> shall <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of them; they shall be in <S%H2342>pain<s%> as a woman that <S%H3205>travails:<s%> they shall be <S%H8539>amazed<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H7453>another;<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall be as <S%H3851>flames.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> <S%H394>cruel<s%> both with <S%H5678>wrath<s%> and <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> to lay the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate:<s%> and he shall <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H2400>sinners<s%> thereof out of it.

For the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H3685>constellations<s%> thereof shall not give their <S%H216>light:<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall be <S%H2821>darkened<s%> in his <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> shall not cause her <S%H216>light<s%> to <S%H5050>shine.<s%>

And I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> for their <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> and I will cause the <S%H1347>arrogance<s%> of the <S%H2086>proud<s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and will lay <S%H8213>low<s%> the <S%H1346>haughtiness<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible.<s%>
I will make a <S%H582>man<s%> more <S%H3365>precious<s%> than fine <S%H6337>gold;<s%> even a <S%H120>man<s%> than the <S%H3800>golden<s%> wedge of <S%H211>Ophir.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will <S%H7264>shake<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7493>remove<s%> out of her <S%H4725>place,<s%> in the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

And it shall be as the <S%H5080>chased<s%> <S%H6643>roe,<s%> and as a <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H6908>takes<s%> up: they shall every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> to his own <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> one <S%H413>into<s%> his own <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> one that is <S%H4672>found<s%> shall be <S%H1856>thrust<s%> <S%H1856>through;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H5595>joined<s%> to them shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Their <S%H5768>children<s%> also shall be <S%H7376>dashed<s%> to pieces before their <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H8155>spoiled,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H7693>ravished.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5782>stir<s%> up the <S%H4074>Medes<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> shall not <S%H2803>regard<s%> <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and as for <S%H2091>gold,<s%> they shall not <S%H2654>delight<s%> in it.

Their <S%H7198>bows<s%> also shall <S%H7376>dash<s%> the <S%H5288>young<s%> men to pieces; and they shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7355>pity<s%> on the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb;<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees'<s%> <S%H1347>excellency,<s%> shall be as when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

It shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it be <S%H7931>dwelled<s%> in from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H6163>Arabian<s%> <S%H167>pitch<s%> <S%H167>tent<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> make their <S%H7257>fold<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

But <S%H6728>wild<s%> <S%H6728>beasts<s%> of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and their <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H255>doleful<s%> <S%H255>creatures;<s%> and <S%H1323>owls<s%> <S%H3284><s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H8163>satyrs<s%> shall <S%H7540>dance<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And the <S%H338>wild<s%> <S%H338>beasts<s%> of the <S%H338>islands<s%> shall <S%H6030>cry<s%> in their <S%H490>desolate<s%> <S%H490>houses,<s%> and <S%H8577>dragons<s%> in their <S%H6027>pleasant<s%> <S%H1964>palaces:<s%> and her <S%H6256>time<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come,<s%> and her <S%H3117>days<s%> shall not be <S%H4900>prolonged.<s%>
